title: Forum Nazi's (Mods)
body:
Seriously guys, wtf are you smoking.

Anything against you, you delete. Even if it is objective (believe me I know the difference of subjectivity and objectivity).

Don't be that guy, don't get all 1984 on this (yes, George Orwell, I'm a sci-fi geek, and no, Star Wars is not sci-fi).

I'm not attacking or malevolent, I'm objective. But you delete it all the same.

Please get educated, you do not seem to know the difference between objectivity and subjectivity.

Moderation is about subtlety, but you lot don't encompass such talents.

Bad mods encourage bad forum behaviour.

replies.body:
I wasn't the one to issue these moderation actions; however, I did review each of the actions on your account. Of which, you were given pretty explicit reasons as to why your posts were removed. You can access these notifications in the notification panel, next to the My Updates panel in the top toolbar. 

Just for good measure, though, I'll take this post as an opportunity to remind you that harassing and blatantly disrespecting other players on the Boards is not allowed, and if you continue with this behaviour, we'll have to escalate your punishments with Boards suspensions. Telling people to "eat [your] dick" and throwing out insults to people you encounter is probably one of the least effective ways to get your point across. 

With that being said, if you'd like to continue this discussion on Boards Moderation, I'd like to direct you to the [**Player Behaviour**](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour) sub-board and I'll be more than happy to address any questions, comments, or concerns that you may have.
Cheesyleeks is the biggest troll on these forums, why is he/she not banned?
this guy cant even meme, that should be bannable enough
Just delete this, like you do everything else that shines a bad light upon you.
